data.comment: The match has started at Nissan Stadium.
Orlando awarded a free kick in their own half.
In the minute 2, Corner awarded to Nashville.
Orlando have been awarded a corner by Jair Marrufo.
Jair Marrufo awards the away team a throw-in.
In the minute 6, Free kick for Orlando in their own half.
Throw-in for Orlando at Nissan Stadium.
Free kick for Orlando in the half of Nashville.
In the minute 12, Free kick Orlando.
Jair Marrufo signals a free kick to Nashville in their own half.
Nashville to take a throw-in in Orlando territory.
In the minute 16, In Nashville a free kick has been awarded the away team.
Jair Marrufo signals a Orlando throw-in in Nashville's half.
Goal! Benji Michel gives Orlando a 0-1 lead.
In the minute 17, Great play from Mauricio Pereyra to set up the goal.
Nashville awarded a throw-in in their own half.
Ball goes out of play for a Nashville goal kick.
In the minute 21, It's a goal kick for the home team in Nashville.
Ball safe as Nashville is awarded a throw-in in their half.
A throw-in for the home team on the opposite half.
In the minute 23, Jair Marrufo signals a free kick to Nashville.
Throw-in high up the field for Orlando in Nashville.
Jair Marrufo signals a free kick to Nashville in their own half.
In the minute 26, Throw-in for Orlando in the half of Nashville.
Jair Marrufo awards Nashville a goal kick.
Throw-in Orlando.
In the minute 29, Free kick for Orlando in their own half.
Goal kick for Orlando at Nissan Stadium.
Orlando awarded a free kick in their own half.
In the minute 34, Nashville awarded a free kick in their own half.
Free kick for Orlando in their own half.
Orlando have a goal kick.
In the minute 39, Throw-in for Orlando in their own half.
Jair Marrufo signals a free kick to Orlando in their own half.
Nashville have been awarded a corner by Jair Marrufo.
In the minute 41, In Nashville, Walker Zimmerman (Nashville) misses the target with a header.
Jair Marrufo awards Orlando a goal kick.
Nashville pushes forward through Randall Leal, whose finish on goal is saved.
In the minute 44, Mauricio Pereyra for Orlando gets in a strike but fails to hit the target.
Nashville have a goal kick.
Nashville's Randall Leal breaks free at Nissan Stadium. But the strike goes wide of the post.
In the minute 45, Ball goes out of play for a Orlando goal kick.
The first-half is over.
The whistle has gone to start the second-half.
In the minute 46, Orlando awarded a free kick in their own half.
Throw-in for Orlando close to the penalty box.
Goal! Randall Leal levels the match at 1-1.
In the minute 47, Hany Mukhtar instrumental with a fine assist.
Throw-in Nashville.
Corner awarded to Nashville.
In the minute 52, Nashville have been awarded a corner by Jair Marrufo.
Corner awarded to Nashville.
Free kick for Orlando in their own half.
In the minute 53, Oscar Pareja is making the team's first substitution at Nissan Stadium with Chris Mueller replacing Robinho.
The away team have replaced Oriol Rosell with Andres Perea. This is the second substitution made today by Oscar Pareja.
In the minute 54, Orlando needs to be cautious. Nashville have an attacking throw-in.
Orlando make their third substitution with Tesho Akindele replacing Daryl Dike.
Orlando will need to be alert as they defend a dangerous free kick from Nashville.
Nashville have a dangerous throw-in.
In the minute 57, Corner awarded to Orlando.
It's a goal kick for the home team in Nashville.
In Nashville Nashville drive forward through Dominique Badji. His shot is on target but it's saved.
In the minute 57, Can Nashville capitalize from this throw-in deep inside Orlando's half?
Junior Urso (Orlando) goes for goal but the shot is blocked by an alert defence.
Orlando have been awarded a corner by Jair Marrufo.
In the minute 59, Orlando have been awarded a corner by Jair Marrufo.
Kamal Miller (Orlando) gets in a strike but the shot is blocked by a defender.
Corner awarded to Orlando.
In the minute 60, Free kick for Orlando in the half of Nashville.
Jhegson Mendez is replacing Mauricio Pereyra for Orlando at Nissan Stadium.
Corner awarded to Orlando.
In the minute 64, Jair Marrufo signals a free kick to Orlando in their own half.
Daniel Rios is replacing Dominique Badji for the home team.
Orlando have been awarded a corner by Jair Marrufo.
In the minute 68, Jair Marrufo signals a throw-in for Orlando, close to Nashville's area.
It's getting dangerous! Free kick for Orlando close to the penalty box.
Orlando drive forward at breakneck speed but are pulled up for offside.
In the minute 71, Gary Smith (Nashville) is making a second substitution, with Abu Danladi replacing Alex Muyl.
Ball safe as Orlando is awarded a throw-in in their half.
Gary Smith is making the team's third substitution at Nissan Stadium with David Accam replacing Randall Leal.
In the minute 73, Can Orlando get the ball into an attacking position from this throw-in in Nashville's half?
The away team replace Benji Michel with Kyle Smith.
Orlando's Kyle Smith is on target but unsuccessful.
In the minute 76, David Accam for Nashville drives towards goal at Nissan Stadium. But the finish is unsuccessful.
Throw-in for Nashville at Nissan Stadium.
Jair Marrufo signals a throw-in for Orlando, close to Nashville's area.
In the minute 79, Jhegson Mendez (Orlando) is given an opening but the shot is blocked by a defender.
Corner awarded to Orlando.
Jair Marrufo signals a Orlando throw-in in Nashville's half.
In the minute 81, In Nashville a free kick has been awarded the away team.
Can Nashville get the ball into an attacking position from this throw-in in Orlando's half?
Orlando awarded a free kick in their own half.
In the minute 84, Junior Urso of Orlando smashes in a shot on target. The keeper saves, though.
Orlando have been awarded a corner by Jair Marrufo.
Throw-in for Nashville in their own half.
In the minute 87, Jair Marrufo awards the home team a throw-in.
Orlando have been awarded a corner by Jair Marrufo.
Throw-in high up the field for Orlando in Nashville.
Free kick Orlando.
The 2nd half is prolonged by 3 minutes of added time.
Jair Marrufo signals a free kick to Nashville in their own half.
That's full-time at Nissan Stadium. The final score is 1-1.
Brian Anunga is replacing Hany Mukhtar for Nashville at Nissan Stadium.
